"Strafe":
"Strafe enables you to make ranged attacks
while on the move."

"Use the following controls to move:
Forward: <%MoveForward> Back: <%MoveBack>
Left: <%MoveLeft> Right: <%MoveRight>

While moving, execute one of the following:
Standard attack: <%NormalAttack> photon art: <%PhotonArts>"

"While using the left stick to move, execute one of the following:
Standard attack: <%NormalAttack> photon art: <%PhotonArts>"

"While Strafe lets you maneuver safely, it also causes your shots to go astray more often.

Fire while standing in place when you want to shoot more accurately.
Use Strafe to stay mobile while taking out enemies."

"Well done out there.
You've pretty much covered all the basics of
handling guns."

"But that's where a lot of soldiers get cocky.
I want you to learn proper combat skills,
instead of going off and doing your own thing."

"It might seem like more work than need be,
but trust me, you'll be grateful for it later.
See you at our next training session."
